summary: Test suite for Kedro's IPython integration, covering formatting of node input descriptions, loading of the IPython extension, lazy loading of Kedro pipelines and objects, behavior of the %load_node magic command, and resolution of project paths under various configurations.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of Kedro's interactive features in IPython/Jupyter environments, ensuring developers can reliably load and execute pipeline nodes, access Kedro objects lazily, and resolve project paths within notebooks.
